title: How to Post a Link on Twitter

steps.title: Find the link you want to share.
steps.content: Find the link you want to share.

steps.title: Highlight the link.
steps.content: Highlight the link. If you’re copying from the address bar, you just need to tap once. If you’re copying from a webpage, tap and drag your finger across the whole link to highlight it all.

steps.title: Open the X app.
steps.content: Open the X app. If you aren’t logged in automatically, type in your email and password and click Login .

steps.title: Tap the Tweet button in the top-right corner.
steps.content: Tap the Tweet button in the top-right corner. This will look like a feather with a box around it.

steps.title: Tap and hold the Tweet box.
steps.content: Tap and hold the Tweet box.

steps.title: Tap the Tweet button.
steps.content: Tap the Tweet button. Now the link will be embedded in your tweet for anyone to click!

steps.title: Find the link you want to share.
steps.content: Find the link you want to share.

steps.title: Highlight the link.
steps.content: Highlight the link. If you’re copying from the address bar, you just need to click once on the link. If you’re copying from a webpage, click and drag your cursor across the whole link to highlight it all.

steps.title: Open twitter.com.
steps.content: Open twitter.com . If you aren’t logged in automatically, type in your email and password and click Login .

steps.title: Click “Paste.”
steps.content: Click “Paste.” Here you can also write any additional text you want in the tweet.

steps.title: Click Tweet.
steps.content: Click Tweet . Now the link will be embedded in your tweet for anyone to click!
